text:
New York NY, ZocDoc

------------ Do you want to transform healthcare from the ground up? Then you should come work at ZocDoc. We're hiring in all our departments but for devs you should know

We score an 11 on the Joel test We're always working on scaling and performance issues We have multiple CI instances

Besides that we have 100% employer-covered health insurance and catered lunch. Positions we're especially looking for include:

Product Managers - https://www.zocdoc.com/careers/product-manager-27 Senior Software Engineers - https://www.zocdoc.com/careers/senior-software-engineer-11 Dev Ops - https://www.zocdoc.com/careers/senior-dev-ops-engineer-454

You can apply from our careers page or email me at arthur.johnston@zocdoc.com
